features.name: heating.dhw.hygiene
features.description: This feature allow to enable the hygiene-function. The hygiene-function heats up the DHW to a setpoint (heating.dhw.temperature.hygiene) high enough to kill any legionella bacteria in the system. If the function is enabled it will be activated according to the defined trigger (heating.dhw.hygiene.trigger). If the function is currently executed, the active-flag will be set to true. Manual activation is possible using the activate-command.

features.name: heating.dhw.hygiene.trigger
features.description: This feature defines when the hygiene function will be executed if it is enabled (heating.dhw.hygiene). The function can be executed once per week on a defined weekday and time or daily. In the latter case, the property weekdays contains all weekdays, otherwise only the one weekday on which the function should run.
